items.sentence: Tom thought it would be a good idea to leave early.
I wish I could\'ve persuaded Tom to do that for us.
I know what you\'re implying, and I don\'t like it.
Have you ever gotten a letter from another country?
Have you looked at yourself in the mirror recently?
Tom didn\'t think Mary\'s idea was a very good one.
Tom was supposed to be here for dinner an hour ago.
Tom was tapping his fingers nervously on the table.
Tom was the one who sold the drugs that Mary stole.
Tom was the one who suggested that we take a break.
